text:
August 14, 1961
Dr. Maurice F. Seay
Kellogg Foundation
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Dr. Seay:
Fortunately, shortly after my letter August 9 the
University of Illinois forwarded the financial informa¬
tion we needed and the fiscal report for the past year
is enclosed herewith, in three copies. Since I, as
President, am responsible for the management of the
Kellogg Grant to the NAEB, Harold Hill as Administrative
Vice President, is largely responsible for the fiscal
affairs of the Association, we have both signed this
letter as certification that the Grant from the W. K.
Kellogg Foundation has been used as specified in the
Grant and as outlined in the enclosed statement.
The program report has been finished and is in
Urbana for duplication. Copies of th3s will be sent
to you tomorrow (Tuesday, August 15) from that office.
As soon as we receive copies here (a day or two later),
I will send you another "safety” copy with a covering
note.
X trust that the budget for the coming year, sent
you earlier, the attached fiscal report for the past
year, and the forthcoming program report provide you
with the necessary information to permit you to issue
the check for $26,800 for the final year of the Grant.
However, if you have any questions, or desire any
further information, please let me know.
Sincerely,
William G. Harley
President
Countersigned:
Harold S. Hill, Administrative Vice President
